Item ID2347

A hammer is a tool used for smithing items on an Anvil, and it is vital to level the Smithing skill. Hammers can be bought from most general stores and will never break. A hammer is also used in the Construction skill when making furniture, and it is required for some minigames.

A hammer is required to access Bandos' stronghold in the God Wars Dungeon; warhammers are an acceptable substitute.

Contents

    • 1.1 Spawns
    • 1.2 Shop locations
  • 2 Quests used in

Players can also obtain hammers in the following locations by:

  • Searching crates at the Motherlode Mine.
  • Searching a supply crate with hammers at the Wintertodt.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
Date unknown

Gems available on free-to-play worlds can no longer be crushed with a hammer to receive a members object (crushed gem).
